aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Tax Examination Status
Amazon is under examination by the Internal Revenue Service for calendar year 2016 and thereafter.
Internal Revenue Service examinations may lead to ordinary course adjustments to Amazon's taxes.
Internal Revenue Service examinations may lead to proposed adjustments to Amazon's taxes.
Internal Revenue Service examinations may lead to adjustments to Amazon's net operating losses for years under examination.
Internal Revenue Service examinations may lead to adjustments to Amazon's net operating losses for subsequent periods.
Amazon is subject to taxation in various states.
Amazon is subject to taxation in various foreign jurisdictions.
Amazon is subject to taxation in China.
Amazon is subject to taxation in France.
Amazon is subject to taxation in Germany.
Amazon is subject to taxation in India.
Amazon is subject to taxation in Japan.
Amazon is subject to taxation in Luxembourg.
Amazon is subject to taxation in the United Kingdom.
Amazon is under audit or examination by relevant authorities in these jurisdictions primarily for 2011 and thereafter.
Amazon may be subject to audit or examination by relevant authorities in these jurisdictions primarily for 2011 and thereafter.
Amazon may be subject to additional assessments by relevant authorities in these jurisdictions.
Amazon is currently disputing tax assessments in multiple jurisdictions.
Amazon is disputing tax assessments with respect to the allocation of income.
Amazon is disputing tax assessments with respect to the characterization of income.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 9 — INCOME TAXES/
/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 8 - Financial Statements and Supplementary Data/NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS/Note 9 — INCOME TAXES/

text:
We are under examination, or may be subject to examination, by the Internal Revenue Service for the calendar year 2016 and thereafter. These examinations may lead to ordinary course adjustments or proposed adjustments to our taxes or our net operating losses with respect to years under examination as well as subsequent periods.

We are also subject to taxation in various states and foreign jurisdictions including China, France, Germany, India, Japan, Luxembourg, and the United Kingdom. We are under, or may be subject to, audit or examination and additional assessments by the relevant authorities in respect of these particular jurisdictions primarily for 2011 and thereafter. We are currently disputing tax assessments in multiple jurisdictions, including with respect to the allocation and characterization of income.
